dataQuery.sqlStatement: SELECT TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'fmMM/DD/YY HH24:MI:SS') sys_date, NVL(:LOC,'ALL') loc_string FROM DUAL

SELECT oref1.order_release_refnum_value loc_code, oref2.order_release_refnum_value commodity, a.shipment_xid shipment_id, a.origin, a.warehouse, a.release_no, oref3.order_release_refnum_value cust_po_release_no, NVL((SELECT ssref1.refnum_value FROM shipment_stop_d ssd INNER JOIN s_ship_unit_refnum ssref1 ON ssref1.s_ship_unit_gid = ssd.s_ship_unit_gid AND ssref1.s_ship_unit_refnum_qual_gid = 'SCOULAR.CONTAINER ID' INNER JOIN s_ship_unit_line sul ON ssd.s_ship_unit_gid = sul.s_ship_unit_gid AND sul.order_release_gid = a.order_release_gid WHERE ssd.shipment_gid = a.shipment_gid AND ssd.stop_num = 1 AND ROWNUM = 1), (SELECT ssref1.refnum_value FROM shipment_stop_d ssd INNER JOIN s_ship_unit_refnum ssref1 ON ssref1.s_ship_unit_gid = ssd.s_ship_unit_gid AND ssref1.s_ship_unit_refnum_qual_gid = 'SCOULAR/FOOD.CONTAINER ID' INNER JOIN s_ship_unit_line sul ON ssd.s_ship_unit_gid = sul.s_ship_unit_gid AND sul.order_release_gid = a.order_release_gid WHERE ssd.shipment_gid = a.shipment_gid AND ssd.stop_num = 1 AND ROWNUM = 1)) container_no, TO_CHAR((SELECT ss.update_date FROM shipment_status ss WHERE ss.shipment_gid = a.shipment_gid AND ss.status_type_gid = 'SCOULAR/FOOD.SAR_AS400' AND ss.status_value_gid = 'SCOULAR/FOOD.SAR_AS400_YES' AND ROWNUM = 1),'fmMM/DD/YY') as400_date, TO_CHAR(NVL(a.start_time,a.early_pickup_date),'fmMM/DD/YY') ets_date, TO_CHAR(NVL(a.end_time,a.late_delivery_date),'fmMM/DD/YY') eta_date, ROUND(NVL((SELECT ssu.unit_net_weight_base FROM shipment_stop_d ssd INNER JOIN s_ship_unit ssu ON ssd.s_ship_unit_gid = ssu.s_ship_unit_gid INNER JOIN s_ship_unit_line sul ON ssu.s_ship_unit_gid = sul.s_ship_unit_gid AND sul.order_release_gid = a.order_release_gid WHERE ssd.shipment_gid = a.shipment_gid AND ssd.stop_num = 1 AND ROWNUM = 1),a.total_weight_base),2) weight_lbs, orem.remark_text comments, a.vessel, TO_CHAR((SELECT NVL(ssuref.update_date, ssuref.insert_date) FROM shipment_stop_d ssd INNER JOIN s_ship_unit_refnum ssuref ON ssuref.s_ship_unit_gid = ssd.s_ship_unit_gid AND ssuref.s_ship_unit_refnum_qual_gid = 'SCOULAR.CONTAINER DRAYED' AND ssuref.refnum_value = 'YES' INNER JOIN s_ship_unit_line sul ON ssd.s_ship_unit_gid = sul.s_ship_unit_gid AND sul.order_release_gid = a.order_release_gid WHERE ssd.shipment_gid = a.shipment_gid AND ssd.stop_num = 1 AND ROWNUM = 1),'fmMM/DD/YY') dray_date, TO_CHAR((SELECT NVL(ssuref.update_date, ssuref.insert_date) FROM shipment_stop_d ssd INNER JOIN s_ship_unit_refnum ssuref ON ssuref.s_ship_unit_gid = ssd.s_ship_unit_gid AND ssuref.s_ship_unit_refnum_qual_gid = 'SCOULAR.DESTINATION WEIGHT' INNER JOIN s_ship_unit_line sul ON ssd.s_ship_unit_gid = sul.s_ship_unit_gid AND sul.order_release_gid = a.order_release_gid WHERE ssd.shipment_gid = a.shipment_gid AND ssd.stop_num = 1 AND ROWNUM = 1),'fmMM/DD/YY') emptied_date FROM (SELECT DISTINCT orel.order_release_gid, orel.early_pickup_date, orel.late_delivery_date, NVL(loc1.location_name, loc1.location_xid) origin, NVL(loc2.location_name, loc2.location_xid) warehouse, orel.order_release_xid release_no, orel.order_release_name vessel, orel.total_weight_base, NULL shipment_xid, NULL shipment_gid, NULL start_time, NULL end_time FROM order_release orel INNER JOIN location loc1 ON orel.source_location_gid = loc1.location_gid INNER JOIN location loc2 ON orel.dest_location_gid = loc2.location_gid WHERE orel.domain_name = 'SCOULAR/FOOD' AND NOT loc1.country_code3_gid IN ('CAN','MEX') AND (NOT loc1.country_code3_gid = 'USA' AND loc2.country_code3_gid = 'USA') AND NOT EXISTS (SELECT oref.order_release_refnum_value FROM order_release_refnum oref WHERE oref.order_release_gid = orel.order_release_gid AND oref.order_release_refnum_qual_gid = 'SCOULAR.PREADVISE' AND oref.order_release_refnum_value = 'YES') AND NOT EXISTS (SELECT s.shipment_gid FROM s_ship_unit_line ssul INNER JOIN shipment_stop_d ssd ON ssd.s_ship_unit_gid = ssul.s_ship_unit_gid AND ssd.stop_num = 1 INNER JOIN shipment s ON ssd.shipment_gid = s.shipment_gid WHERE ssul.order_release_gid = orel.order_release_gid) UNION SELECT DISTINCT orel.order_release_gid, orel.early_pickup_date, orel.late_delivery_date, NVL(loc1.location_name, loc1.location_xid) origin, NVL(loc2.location_name, loc2.location_xid) warehouse, orel.order_release_xid release_no, s.shipment_name vessel, orel.total_weight_base, s.shipment_xid, s.shipment_gid, s.start_time, s.end_time FROM order_release orel INNER JOIN location loc1 ON orel.source_location_gid = loc1.location_gid INNER JOIN location loc2 ON orel.dest_location_gid = loc2.location_gid INNER JOIN s_ship_unit_line ssul ON orel.order_release_gid = ssul.order_release_gid INNER JOIN shipment_stop_d sstopd ON sstopd.s_ship_unit_gid = ssul.s_ship_unit_gid AND sstopd.stop_num = 1 INNER JOIN shipment s ON sstopd.shipment_gid = s.shipment_gid AND s.shipment_type_gid = 'TRANSPORT' AND s.transport_mode_gid = 'VESSEL-CO' WHERE orel.domain_name = 'SCOULAR/FOOD' AND (NOT loc1.country_code3_gid = 'USA' AND loc2.country_code3_gid = 'USA') AND NOT EXISTS (SELECT s.shipment_gid FROM shipment sh INNER JOIN shipment_stop_d ssdd ON ssdd.s_ship_unit_gid = ssul.s_ship_unit_gid AND ssdd.stop_num = 1 INNER JOIN s_ship_unit_refnum ssuref ON ssdd.s_ship_unit_gid = ssuref.s_ship_unit_gid AND ssuref.s_ship_unit_refnum_qual_gid = 'SCOULAR.CONTAINER DRAYED' AND ssuref.refnum_value = 'YES' INNER JOIN s_ship_unit_line sul ON ssdd.s_ship_unit_gid = sul.s_ship_unit_gid AND sul.order_release_gid = orel.order_release_gid WHERE sh.shipment_gid = s.shipment_gid AND TO_DATE(TO_CHAR(NVL(ssuref.update_date,ssuref.insert_date),'MM-DD-YYYY'),'mm-dd-rrrr') <= TO_DATE(TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'MM/DD/YYYY'),'mm-dd-rrrr') - 31)) a LEFT OUTER JOIN order_release_refnum oref1 ON a.order_release_gid = oref1.order_release_gid AND oref1.order_release_refnum_qual_gid = 'SCOULAR.LOC_CODE' LEFT OUTER JOIN order_release_refnum oref2 ON a.order_release_gid = oref2.order_release_gid AND oref2.order_release_refnum_qual_gid = 'SCOULAR.COMMODITY' LEFT OUTER JOIN order_release_refnum oref3 ON a.order_release_gid = oref3.order_release_gid AND oref3.order_release_refnum_qual_gid = 'SCOULAR.CUSTOMER PO RELEASE NUMBER' LEFT OUTER JOIN order_release_remark orem ON a.order_release_gid = orem.order_release_gid AND orem.remark_qual_gid = 'SCOULAR/FOOD.CONTAINER NOTES' WHERE (:LOC IS NULL OR (NOT :LOC IS NULL AND oref1.order_release_refnum_value IN (SELECT TO_NUMBER(xt.column_value) FROM XMLTABLE(LTRIM(RTRIM(REGEXP_REPLACE(REGEXP_REPLACE(:LOC,'[^[:digit:]]+', ','),'^,+|,+$'), ','), ',')) xt))) ORDER BY oref1.order_release_refnum_value, a.warehouse, oref2.order_release_refnum_value, a.release_no
